name: To The Other Side (SirTartarus)
description:
Steve got stolen, and all his steampunk machines have dissapeared! Why would someone do that? Who has it been? Steve doesn´t have many enemies, mainly because he usually talks to inanimate objects. However, the thief has been dropping some of Steve´s gears on his path, so maybe you can get them back by solving simple puzzles!

Luckily the thief forgot to steal Steve´s last project... The Anima-Motus! This invention is able to make it´s owner´s soul into steam, making him rise to the ceiling and being able to return to it´s human form. Steve will use this to catch the criminal, but the difficult part may be... well, dying!

This game was originally made for the Minijam 102, with the theme Steam and limitation "Death is not the end". It is a short puzzle/platformer with a round, cute story, and characters with enjoyable personalities you will love!
